sections.text: The MEM program blends engineering depth with business, product, and operations management to prepare technical leaders for industry.

items: Core in accounting, finance, marketing, leadership, decision analytics, operations, and product management
sections.text: Students complete a management-focused core designed for engineers and customize with technical/business electives and real-world projects.

items: Bachelorâ€™s in engineering or closely related field
Completion of approved plan of study per program policy
sections.text: Admissions expect technical preparation; degree plans are customized and may be completed full-time or part-time.
Graduates move into product management, operations, consulting, and engineering leadership roles.
